channel.title: Source: make a command execute overtime?
channel.description: Is it possible to make a console command be executed once every second for example, without having to bind it to a key and press it over and over again? For example, I wanna have impulse 101 to be executed overtime on my gluon-fun playthrough of BM.

item.title: Source: make a command execute overtime?

alias lolinfiniteammo4eva “impulse 101; wait 200; lolinfiniteammo4eva”
lolinfiniteammo4eva
